page.title: 05Day in the life of an adult
page.content: 7.30am-Get up,wash,dress,open mail 8.00am-Wash and dress Debbie(5) 8.15am-Have breakfast 8.55am-Take Debbie to school 9.10am-Do housework eg.dusting 10.45am-Coffee break 11.00am-Continue with housework 12.00-Collect Debbie from school 12.10pm-Prepare and eat lunch(baked beans,spaghetti,eggs or cheese on toast,a piece of cake or some fresh fruit and a drink of juice or milk) 1.10pm-Take Debbie back to school 1.45pm To 3.00pm-Go shopping 3.25pm-Collect Debbie from school 4.00pm-Prepare,cook and eat evening meal(pork spare ribs,stuffing,sauce, potatoes,cabbage,peas,rice pudding, cup of tea)Wash pots 6.15pm-to 7.15pm-Put Debbie to bed 9.00pm-to 11.30pm-TV,have drinks 11.30pm-Go to bed
